ازيكم يا شباب :] عندي استفسار بما اني معنديش اي خبرة في موضوع الاتصالات دا .

هو ازاي لما بتصل من سكايب علي التليفون بيظهر ( private number ) ومرات بيظهر رقم ( 00 ) ومرات بيظهر ( 0 ) بس 
ومرات بيظهر رقم تليفون جوه مصر . ارقام فودافون . معني كدا ان لو الشركات التانية بتقدر تهاندل اختيار الرقم ان ممكن حد يستخدم رقمي من شركة تاني ؟

posts.message:
I found this article interesting, and thought I would 

This is Microsoft admitting its mobile strategy was a failure
Or, to be more accurate about it, it’s the final page in the chapter labeled “Windows Phone”. Having admitted that the Nokia purchase was a bad one, having admitted that Windows Phone wasn’t the success they wanted it to be, Microsoft is now (finally!) looking to recircle the wagons. The Lumia phones simply weren’t selling, and while I certainly know a number of people personally who love their Windows Phone, almost all of them are either Microsoft employees or relatives of Microsoft employees. Sales figures certainly seemed to agree with my understanding of consumers’ dislike of the devices, compared to iOS and Android.
posts.caption: blogs.tedneward.com

posts.message:
يا جماعة اللي بيحصل في سيرفرات ال Code School ده Over And Above 
ما يصحش كده :D
ده جزائهم يعني يعني عشان 3 أيام free :)

Guys how do you/your company organize the senstive data related to the clients servers, access credentials, servers URLs ... etc
I have seen companies and people using excel sheets and share it across the employees using Google Drive, using tools like Microsoft One Note, just storing them in plain text files on their desktops ...
Currently we store the details regarding the projects (like how to kickoff, how to deploy, dependencies ...etc) in a readme file in the root of the repository but we can't save senstive info like that.
I searched for tools and found some options suggested by the users on http://security.stackexchange.com but I am curious to see if anyone here solved that problem before. I am looking for a solution that makes a central repository and simple to use.
Edit: forgot to add to be secure too :D
Thank you.
posts.caption: security.stackexchange.com

posts.message:
هو فى self taught programmer فكر في انه يذاكر رياضة بتمعن جدا و يفهمها و يخش فى ال algorithms بقلب جامد غيري ؟ ولا الي بفكر فيه ده مش هيفيدني اوي (حتة الرياضة) ؟ انا حابب اني اكون متميز كمبرمج .. و ادرس الموضوع دراسة اكاديمية شوية اكتر .. هل ده هيفيدني ؟؟ و لو اه، ايه المجالات المفروض اذاكرها كمبرمج ؟ انا دورت لقيت الكتاب ده حلو جدا 
http://www.amazon.com/Princeton-Companion-Mathematics-Timothy-Gowers/dp/0691118809
بس مليان جدا .. هل كدا بضيع وقت و مجهود ولا ايه الدنيا ؟
